data.name: Preset Message 1
data.message: “When you're sad and alone… The only one you can count on is yourself.”

data.name: Preset Message 2
data.message: “A weapon's strength or weakness is dependent on the user's ability to use it. An expert with a pebble can still beat a novice with a shuriken.”

data.name: Preset Message 3
data.message: “Well to say it simply… He wants to get rid of all the bad things in the world and run away to a dreamland full of good things! In a dream you can do whatever you want… even revive the dead.”

data.name: Preset Message 4
data.message: “This entire world exists for the sake of one conquering another.”
